description: Represents an in-memory Image. Unlike ImageData it is immutable, but can be created from a number of sources via [createImageBitmap](#createimagebitmapimage).

close.description: Disposes the resources associated with this ImageBitmap. Should be called once the image is no longer needed to free up memory.

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: The data source to create an ImageBitmap instance from.

createImageBitmap.description: Creates a promise that resolves to a new instance of ImageBitmap. Also available in global scope.
